references.paper_title: StyTr2: Image style transfer with transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel transformer-based approach to image style transfer, which is a central topic of the current paper and provides a relevant baseline for comparison.

references.paper_title: DiffStyler: Controllable dual diffusion for text-driven image stylization
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art text-driven image stylization method, which is directly relevant to the dataset and evaluation methods used in the current study.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset used for training image-text models, which is relevant to the current paper's dataset construction and provides a valuable resource for model evaluation.

references.paper_title: Learning to evaluate the artness of AI-generated images
references.reason: This paper focuses on evaluating the aesthetic quality of AI-generated images, which is directly related to the central research question of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the chain-of-thought prompting method which is used in the current work to improve the reasoning ability of large language models for art evaluation.
